item.description:
Job Seeker, Consultant, Salesperson or Entrepeneur: Make Networking Work for You

Along with facilitated professional networking, attendees will learn

· The 3 Must Do’s to Prepare for an event.

· The ONE SURE WAY to meet everybody at the event.

· 5 great openers even if you’re shy!

· Guaranteed success in 30 seconds.

· Great questions that work.

· Graceful, polite and effective exits.

· 3 Steps to effective follow-up.

· How to get invited back.

· How to get invited in.



Frank Belzer and Rick Roberge are sales development experts at Kurlan & Associates. They recently presented The 21 Core Competencies to be a Sales Superstar at the MIT/Sloan Sales Conference 2010 and are well known in the industry as trainer/consultants that practice what they preach on a daily basis. Rick posts new articles regularly to his blog, The RainMaker Maker and Frank relates modern day sales issues to historical events and the great leaders of the past on his blog, The Sales Archaeologist. They will arrive early and be available throughout the evening to help, advise and network with everybody in attendance.

After the presentation, there will be a chocolate tasting surprise... more details to come, for now just remember to bring your sweet tooth!

See you there!
Dimitry Neyshtadt
617-680-7431
item.name: S.A. and InsiderPerk present: Facilitated Networking ... With Chocolate!
